page.title: 05A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I GET UP AT 8 O'CLOCK AND GET TO SCHOOL AT 8.45.I PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS TILL THE BUS BRINGS ALL THE CHILDREN FROM FOXHAM THEN WE ALL GO IN.WE GO TO ASSEMBLY FIRST THEN WE START OUR WORK.I LIKE DOING TOPIC WORK BEST BECAUSE IT IS INTERESTING AND YOU HAVE TO FIND OUT LOTS OF THINGS FROM BOOKS OR BY SEARCHING AROUND.I LIKE WRITING STORIES BECAUSE YOU CAN WRITE ABOUT ADVENTURES WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND DRAW PICTURES ABOUT THEM.I HAVE TO DO MATHS.I AM DOING THE 24 HOUR CLOCK BUT IT IS NOT VERY EASY.I SOMETIMES DO SOME SOUND SENSE WORK FOR ENGLISH.I AM READING A BOOK CALLED THE LITTLE GREEN BOOK.IT IS AFUNNY STORY .IN ART I AM MAKING A MODEL ROAD WITH 2 FRIENDS.MR.BUCHANAN IS READING US A STORY CALLED DANNY THE CHAMPION OF THE WORLD
